pullRequest.title: Added materials to CoalGenerator
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Tags
please dont break it this time <3
Changes
added materials to coalgen
Related Issues
Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I have added Nonnull and Nullable annotations to my methods to indicate their behaviour for null values
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

commit.message: note to self listen to your notes

nodes.bodyText: You use 5 planks to craft a boat, so it should be 5 here.
You use 6 planks to craft 2 trapdoors, so it should be 3 here.
You use 2 planks to craft a pressure plate, so it should be 2 here.
You use 6 planks to craft 3 doors, so it should be 2 here.
You use 6 planks to craft 3 signs, so it should be 2 here.
You accidentally removed the fire tag, that's why it is failing.

commit.message: Did i really get out of bed for this
